revised_title: Analyzing Single-Channel Data and Missed Events in Ion Channel Gating Mechanisms
tldr: The authors analyze the effects of time interval omission on single-ion channel data and develop a two-state Markov model to study receptor-channel gating mechanisms. They demonstrate that analyzing data from a range of agonist concentrations can help identify the true parameter estimates and improve the understanding of channel gating kinetics.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cell Biology
